title: Are the Juggernaut changes live?
body: Just wondering, because I don't wanna pick them otherwise and I'd rather not waste 30-40 minutes of my life playing someone I don't want to.

replies.body: yeah you wanna play assassins just like every other stooge
Darius cannot apply haemorrhage (autocorrected, pretty sure it is wrong) stacks with the handle damage of his q now, other bucket loads of nerfs are also on the way for the other 3 champs
besides darius , after lvl 30 how many  people actually play garen,morde or skarner.... ive been playing for a while and ive seen someone play skarner once because they rolled him on aram.
